product_name: REI Hallow Canyon T-Shirt - Toddler Boys'
long_description: With contrasting color panels, the REI Hallow Canyon T-shirt creates a great look for your youngster as a standalone shirt in mild weather or as a layering piece for playing outside in the cold. Raglan sleeves provide non-binding freedom of movement. UPF 50+ sun protection; chest pocket; contrast stitching.
short_description: With contrasting color panels, the REI Hallow Canyon T-shirt creates a great look for your youngster as a standalone shirt in mild weather or as a layering piece for playing outside in the cold.
